chapter.title: Download
chapter.para: The official JBoss Messaging project page is http://www.jboss.org/jbossmessaging/.

section.title: Software Download
section.para: The download location is the JBoss Labs Messaging Project download zone: http://www.jboss.org/jbossmessaging/downloads/

section.title: SVN Repository
section.para: You can checkout the development version of JBoss Messaging directly from its Subversion repository. Be aware that the information provided in this manual might then not be accurate. For the latest instructions on how to check out and build source code, please go to Messaging Development Wiki, and specifically Building and Running JBoss Messaging page.
